if(WARN_DISABLE_3RD)
  if("${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "GNU" OR "${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "Clang")
    add_compile_options(-w)
  elseif("${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "MSVC")
    add_compile_options(/w)
  endif()
endif()


foreach(module ${thirdparty_modules})
  message(STATUS "adding thirdparty module " ${module})
  add_subdirectory(${module})
  if(${module})
    get_target_property(MODULE_TYPE ${module} TYPE)
    if(NOT ${MODULE_TYPE} STREQUAL "INTERFACE_LIBRARY")
      set_target_properties(${module} PROPERTIES FOLDER "third-party")
    endif()
  endif()
endforeach()
